# TODO description
#

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)
include(CTest)

set(
    RISCV_ARCH_TESTER_SOURCES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/riscv_arch_tester.cpp
)

add_executable(riscv_arch_tester ${RISCV_ARCH_TESTER_SOURCES})
target_include_directories(riscv_arch_tester PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/)#To get access to the public libirve headers
#We need access to the internal libirve headers (including the autogenerated ones) to read out the riscvof signature at the end
target_include_directories(riscv_arch_tester PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/ ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
target_link_libraries(riscv_arch_tester PRIVATE libirve_object)#TODO or should we make this static or shared instead?
